title: M1 MacBook deals take extra discounts at Amazon - save up to $150 with the lowest prices ever
author: tabitha-baker
summary: M1 MacBook deals drop to new price lows
article: M1 MacBook deals were already offering some excellent discounts last week, but today Amazon has upped the game with extra savings leaving these powerful laptops at their lowest prices yet. Not only that, but we're seeing these discounts across the range right now, with price cuts on both the M1 MacBook Pro and Air. You'll find an extra $50 off the previous cheapest price at Amazon right now, on both the 256GB and 512GB configurations.

That means we're now seeing M1 MacBook deals starting at just $899 on the Air model. We'd previously only seen MacBook Air deals hitting $949 on this model, with a respectable $50 off the $999 MSRP. However, with this extra discount you'll be able to pick up Apple's most powerful Air to date for its lowest price yet.

If you're after something a little more powerful, Amazon's MacBook deals on the Pro model have also taken extra discounts today. You can now grab a 256GB M1 MacBook Pro for a record low $1,149 price (was $1,299), or upgrade to a 512GB for just $1,349 (was $1,499).
You'll find all these M1 MacBook deals, and similar discounts on larger configurations, just below.
Not in the US? Scroll down for more cheap MacBook prices in your region.

If you're after an older model, you'll find plenty more MacBook Air sales and cheap MacBook Pro prices up for grabs. However, if you're looking for something a little cheaper check out all the best laptop deals available this week.
